name: Early Morning Flight in Delta Comfort Plus on an Airbus A220 - Indianapolis (IND) to Detroit (DTW)
description:
Welcome to this Full Flight Experience aboard an Airbus 220 flight from Indianapolis International Airport to Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport! I took the first of three daily flights between Indiana's busiest airport and nearby Detroit's Delta hub. This short, 40-minute flight highlights the advantages of flying Delta's economy-plus product, Comfort+, as well as the flying experience everyone gets to enjoy! 

Thanks for flying with me, and enjoy the ride!

Video Timeline
00:00 – Intro
00:45 – Boarding 
01:10 – Seat and Legroom
01:40 – Pushback
03:00 – Taxiing at IND
03:25 – Takeoff
04:30 – Inflight Experience
05:05 – Approach
06:15 – Landing
07:15 – Taxiing at DTW
07:40 – Gate Arrival
08:20 – End Screen

#flight #delta #a220 #indianapolis #detroit #indy  #dtw #flightreview #flightreport 

__________________________________________________________________________________

Flight Information

Airline: Delta Air Lines

Flight Number: DL 1590

Origin Airport: Indianapolis International Airport (KIND/IND)

Destination Airport: Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport (KDTW/DTW)

Departing Gate: A13

Boarding Time: 05:42 EDT

Scheduled Departure: 06:10 EDT 

Actual Departure from Gate: 05:54 EDT

Takeoff Runway and Time: RWY 23R / 06:18 EDT

Landing Runway and Time: RWY 22L / 07:00 EDT

Scheduled Arrival: 07:23 EDT 

Actual Arrival at Gate: 07:16 EDT

Arriving Gate: A5


Total Flight Time: 42 minutes

Total Gate-to-Gate: 1 hour, 20 minutes

Distance between Airports: 231 mi/371 km

Aircraft Information

Type: Airbus A220-171
Registration: N126DU
